name: Castle Crawl (WhoReallyCaresGames)
description:
Plunder the castle in this 2d action platformer! Crush skulls with your mighty mace, rend flesh with your magic sword, and cleave goblins in half with your mighty axe!

Featuring eight different levels and two unique bosses, the mighty Ogre and the Red Dragon. Can you find the two extra secret levels hidden within?

Show off your skills by ranking on the online leaderboard system!

This game features melee combat and traditional platforming.

Control the hero with the arrow keys and use space bar to attack!

If you prefer to play in a classic style, the game has support for controllers.

Use the D-pad to control your character, south button to jump and east button to attack!
